page.title: 15A day in my life.
page.content: I usually get up at 8.20am. I go downstairs and have my breakfast which is usually tea and biscuits.When I've finished I go to the bathroom and wash and clean my teeth. I then dress and have my hair done.I leave for school at 8.58am as I live very near the school,which starts at 9am. We have registration followed by assembly. After assembly we have a Maths lesson followed by playtime.Then we have English.Dinnertime is at 12 noon and I go home for dinner.After dinner I return to school for the afternoon. We have different lessons such as Art, Welsh,Science,etc. We have a playtime and school ends at 3.50pm. After tea I watch television,read,practise playing my violin and sometimes I go out to play. At 9.30pm I have supper and go to bed. (By Alison John of Hafod CP school)
